level.heading: Severability.
level.text: If any section, subsection, subdivision, paragraph, sentence, clause, or provision of this chapter shall be unconstitutional or ineffective, in whole or in part, to the extent that it is not unconstitutional or ineffective it shall be valid and effective, and no other section, subsection, subdivision, paragraph, sentence, clause, or provision shall on account thereof be deemed invalid or ineffective.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-135
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-135, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 42-2701.01.
